subtitle: A classic recipe for a delicious soup.

method.text: Melt the butter in a large saucepan. Add the onion. Fry for 2 min or until softened. Add the potatoes and broccoli. Fry for 2 min, stirring constantly.
Add the lime juice, seasoning and stock to the pan. Bring to the boil. Cover. Simmer for 25-30 min or until broccoli is tender.
Ladle the soup into a food processor or blender. Process until smooth. Return soup to the clean pan. Heat through gently for 3-5 min.
Stir the cream into the soup. Serve.

title: Cream of broccoli soup
